headline: Mark Kelly's silence speaks volumes about his campaign strategy
author: Cam Edwards
sentences: Mark Kelly, Arizona’s junior senator and the co-founder of the gun control group Giffords, won a special election to fill the remaining two years of the late John McCain’s Senate term, but now he’s up for a full six-year term of his own, and as The Hill reports, his campaign strategy is simple: shut up and take people’s money.
